description: Example case for skill.skill_scaffolder_basic: scaffolding a new repo cleanup skill.

input.title: Repository cleanup planner (basic)
input.short_purpose: LLM-only skill that analyzes a repository structure and generates a cleanup plan: identifies unused files, large directories, duplicate content, and suggests what can be safely removed or archived.
input.input_brief: Repository structure dump (file tree), optional README, optional notes about cleanup goals (e.g. 'remove node_modules', 'archive old docs').
input.output_brief: Structured cleanup plan with: list of files/directories to remove (with reasons), list of items to archive, list of items to keep, estimated space savings, and a checklist for the human.
input.notes_for_prompt_profile: Focus on safety: never suggest removing files that might be important. Always mark uncertain items as 'needs review'.
